tooltip.solapple.hearty.not_eaten: Not yet eaten! What does it taste like?
tooltip.solapple.cheap: This food is not nourishing enough to improve your health.
tooltip.solapple.disabled.blacklist: This food is in the blacklist and thus cannot improve your health.
tooltip.solapple.disabled.whitelist: This food is not in the whitelist and thus cannot improve your health.
command.solapple.foodlist.no_permissions: You do not have the permissions necessary to apply this command to other players!
command.solapple.foodlist.size.desc.mile: You sadly cannot gain any more health from trying new foods.
You need %s more to increase your max health.
message.solapple.milestone_achieved: What a unique flavor! You've gained %s!
message.solapple.finished.chat: Your desire to seek unique foods is finally satisfied.
message.solapple.finished.hotbar: You've gained %s. Your desire to seek unique foods is finally satisfied.
gui.solapple.food_book.config.tooltip.mi: The minimum hunger value foods need to provide in order to count towards milestones.
gui.solapple.food_book.config.tooltip.he: Out of %1$s foods, %2$s are nourishing enough to improve your health.
gui.solapple.food_book.config.tooltip.ea: Out of the %1$s foods that aren't nourishing enough to improve your health, you've eaten %2$s.
gui.solapple.food_book.config.tooltip.bl: How many foods have been disabled by the blacklist.
gui.solapple.food_book.config.tooltip.wh: How many foods the whitelist allows.
